import { Link } from "react-router-dom" import IndexNavbar from "components/Navbars/IndexNavbar.js" import Footer from "components/Footers/Footer.js" import ProjectCard from "components/ProjectCard.js" import SuccessStats from "components/SuccessStats.js" import Testimonial from "components/Testimonial.js" // Sample featured projects data const featuredProjects = [ { id: 1, title: "EcoTech: Sustainable Smart Home", description: "A revolutionary smart home system focused on sustainability and energy efficiency.", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1558002038-1055907df827?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1350&q=80", fundedAmount: 75000, goal: 100000, backers: 520, daysLeft: 15, }, { id: 2, title: "ArtVista: Interactive Art Gallery", description: "An immersive digital art gallery bringing masterpieces to life through AR technology.", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1547891654-e66ed7ebb968?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1350&q=80", fundedAmount: 30000, goal: 50000, backers: 310, daysLeft: 22, }, { id: 3, title: "FoodShare: Community Meal Planning", description: "A mobile app connecting neighbors to share meals, reduce food waste, and build community.", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1547592180-85f173990888?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1350&q=80", fundedAmount: 12000, goal: 20000, backers: 180, daysLeft: 30, }, ] const testimonials = [ { quote: "CrowdFund helped me turn my idea into a successful business. The support from the community was incredible!", author: "Sarah Johnson", role: "Entrepreneur", image: "https://randomuser.me/api/portraits/women/1.jpg", }, { quote: "As an artist, I found the perfect platform to bring my creative projects to life. CrowdFund is a game-changer!", author: "Michael Chen", role: "Artist", image: "https://randomuser.me/api/portraits/men/2.jpg", }, { quote: "The exposure and funding I received through CrowdFund allowed me to scale my invention beyond my wildest dreams.", author: "Emily Rodriguez", role: "Inventor", image: "https://randomuser.me/api/portraits/women/3.jpg", }, ] const recentlyFundedProjects = [ { id: 4, title: "EcoPackage: Zero-Waste Packaging", description: "Innovative, fully biodegradable packaging solutions for a greener future.", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1605600659908-0ef719419d41?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1350&q=80", fundedAmount: 50000, goal: 40000, backers: 750, daysLeft: 0, }, { id: 5, title: "MindfulApp: Mental Health Support", description: "An AI-powered app providing personalized mental health resources and support.", image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1576633587382-13ddf37b1fc1?ixlib=rb-1.2.1&auto=format&fit=crop&w=1350&q=80", fundedAmount: 100000, goal: 80000, backers: 2000, daysLeft: 0, }, ] export default function Index() { return ( <> {/* Hero Section (keep existing code) */}

CrowdFund - Make Your Ideas Reality

CrowdFund is a platform where innovators and supporters come together. Start your project, support great ideas, and be part of something big.

Start a Project Explore Projects
{/* Success Stats Section (New) */}

Empowering Creators Worldwide

Join a global community of innovators, artists, and entrepreneurs. CrowdFund has helped bring thousands of creative projects to life.

{/* Featured Projects Section (keep existing code) */}

Featured Projects

Discover innovative projects from creators around the world. These featured campaigns represent the diversity and creativity of our CrowdFund community.

{featuredProjects.map((project) => (
))}
{/* How It Works Section (New) */}

How It Works

Getting your project funded on CrowdFund is easy. Follow these simple steps to turn your idea into reality.

1 Create your project
2 Set your funding goal
3 Share with your network
4 Get funded and make it happen!
{/* Newsletter Signup Section (New) */}

Stay Updated with CrowdFund

Subscribe to our newsletter to get the latest updates on exciting projects, success stories, and platform news.

Fund Your Dreams

CrowdFund provides a platform for creators to bring their projects to life. From innovative products to creative works, we help you connect with backers who believe in your vision.

Launch Ideas

Turn your creative ideas into reality with the support of our community.

Secure Funding

Get the financial backing you need to bring your project to life.

Build Community

Connect with backers who believe in your project and want to see it succeed.

Achieve Goals

Take your project from concept to completion with the support of CrowdFund.

Technology

Design

Film & Video

Music

Discover Projects

Explore a wide range of innovative projects across various categories. From cutting-edge technology to creative arts, find the projects that inspire you and make a difference by supporting them.

Our platform showcases projects from passionate creators worldwide. Be part of bringing these ideas to life!

View All Projects
{/* Newsletter Signup Section (New) */}

Ready to Launch Your Project?

Join thousands of creators who have successfully funded their projects on CrowdFund. Whether you're an artist, inventor, or entrepreneur, our platform gives you the tools to bring your ideas to life.

Start Your Project Learn How It Works
{/* Testimonials Section (New) */}

Hear From Our Community

Discover how CrowdFund has helped creators and innovators bring their ideas to life.

{testimonials.map((testimonial, index) => ( ))}
{/* Recently Funded Projects Section (New) */}

Recently Funded Projects

These projects have recently reached their funding goals thanks to our amazing community of backers. Get inspired and start your own project today!

View All Successful Projects
{recentlyFundedProjects.map((project) => ( ))}
{/* Trust Indicators Section (New) */}

Trusted by Creators and Backers Worldwide

CrowdFund is committed to providing a secure, transparent, and effective platform for bringing ideas to life.

Verified Projects

We carefully review each project to ensure legitimacy and feasibility.

Transparent Funding

Track project progress and funding in real-time with our transparent system.

Innovation Support

We provide resources and guidance to help creators succeed.
